titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness f1831, Collation unit C08c

sourceDesc.p: Produced from collation output prepared in batch file processing on 2018-10-04 16:58:37.992715 .
Edited to correct alignments and prepared for the Frankenstein Variorum spine on 2019-03-17T14:23:51.998-04:00.

body.ab:
Never was she so enchanting as at this time, when she recalled the sunshine of her smiles and spent them upon us. She forgot even her own regret in her endeavours to make us forget.

The day of my departure at length arrived.
